item.title: Need some help please!
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

Finally got the run.bat fixed on this server, got the anti leech off, but then i go to run it, it works, i try to log in, i get “no response from login server” Then i look at my client command prompt and it says, “checking server status …” and it keeps saying that…how do i get it to quit saying that and log me in? Everything is set to 127.0.0.1 (local host)

if someone could help it would be great,
Thanks

Read full topic
